msg: This is a duplicate of a class in Collections (barely any difference), and
with the move of CollectionsUtils over, is no longer needed here.

msg: Use Ant's <filter> task to pre-process the version during a build.

author: bayard
msg: Removed as its functionality is duplicated by Commons.Collections.CollectionUtil
It was already duplicated the methods except for one large one, slice,
which I believe was removed due to it being conceptually poor.
